dc_creator_sm: New York (N.Y.). Department of City Planning
dc_description_s: Polygon features representing the zoning districts. These features are continuous over the entire city. They extend to the city limits on land and out to the US Army Corps of Engineers Pierhead lines over water. Zoning district designations are indicated in the ZONEDIST attribute.
dc_publisher_s: New York (N.Y.). Department of City Planning
